title: The Unknown land
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Roland Beckett and Oliver Howes
brief_description: Scenes and songs of Australia’s northwest; the Pilbara and Kimberley areas, prospecting (old and new) and mining, pearling at Broome, the Ord River dam, and the cattle industry.
